title: ESA Reval Results (3rd Sem)
content: Did anyone get their grade changed after reval for 3rd Sem ESA (B. Tech) ?

comments.body: Still hasnt released yet right? I asked in coe today and they said it'll release this week
If your grade moves from provisional results to final results, you'll know that re-eval results are out
nope its out and says no grade change
